testcase.name: Check if user is able to add item to cart
testcase.system-out: Given user is on login page.................................................passed When user enters username...................................................passed And click on login button...................................................passed Then user is navigated to home page.........................................passed And user adds an item into cart.............................................passed And user clicks on checkout in cart.........................................passed And user enters delivery details............................................passed And user completes the order successfully...................................passed
